column1: Kata Robata////Atmosphere was nice. Good date place.  We came here for lunch. Because I heard from Chris C.
column2: to give their Ramen a go.  And alllll I wanted in my life yesterday
column3: was good ramen. Great ramen. And goddamn it I found it.  So good
column5: that I feel like I owe Chris a thank you drink.
